content: The Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World, is located in which Indian city?

The Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders of the World, is located in Agra, Uttar Pradesh, India. This magnificent mausoleum was commissioned by Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan in memory of his beloved wife, Mumtaz Mahal. It is renowned for its stunning white marble architecture, intricate decorative elements, and serene gardens. Agra is a city in the northern part of India and is easily accessible by air, rail, and road, making it a popular destination for tourists from around the world.
